name: - Bright Yak (Nepal series #13) -
description:
Here we are in the middle of our journey. Before we reached the next village, we passed this yak. Domesticated yaks are very important to the people of this valley. They need them for their milk, meat and fibre (yak wool). Since not much grows at these altitudes, the people here live mainly on dairy products, meat, potatoes and lentils.

5616px X 3744px
